name: Adroit Soft India
description: I’ve supported over 50 clients by resolving 95% of software issues within 24 hours, ensuring smooth functionality and high satisfaction. I created 100+ custom reports using I-Report, enabling better data visibility and decision-making. I conducted 15+ product demos, helping acquire 10+ new customers, and implemented software across 20+ client environments—reducing deployment time by 30%. I enhanced 25+ features based on client feedback, improving usability by 20%, and led a team of 4 developers to deliver timely upgrades.
